item.description:
January's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Open Discussion

We will still meet in Newton Highlands, but I want to give Baker's Best a chance. I realize they close at 5:00, so if we want to keep going, we'll decamp to Lincoln Street Cafe up the street.

Agenda:

3:00 Names. What do you plan to write next?

Topic:

Open discussion. What would you like to talk about next?

4:00 Break

5:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers January Meetup
